findings.title: Centralized Control of State Variable
findings.description: Critical state variables can be updated any time by the controlling authorities without notifying the users.

findings.title: Improper Reward Distribution
findings.description: A part of the compounded rewards could be claimed by a user without any prior token deposited, causing the other users to gain less compounded rewards.

findings.title: Transaction Ordering Dependence
findings.description: The front-running attack can be performed, resulting in a bad swapping rate for the reinvestment and lower reward for the platform users.

findings.title: Insufficient Logging for Privileged Functions
findings.description: Privileged functions that are executable by the controlling parties are not logged properly by emitting events.

findings.title: Inexplicit Solidity Compiler Version
findings.description: The solidity compiler version is not explicitly specified.

findings.title: Improper Function Visibility
findings.description: The functions' visibility was not properly set, potentially allowing unauthorized access.
